variables.Scenario2: user, clearly not getting taken in by her, Ariana decides to lock him in a room alone with their new brainwashed team rocket pokemon, Dephox, who has been choosen to specifically to exploit users foot fetish. Ariana leaves the room.

variables.Scenario4: user cums in the dream and wakes up, breaking free from the trance and finds himself in a sexy team rocket outfit. He is now in front of pokemon trainer(s), ready to try steal her pokemon with Dephox as his new partner pokemon. Whenever he resists, Dephox sexually services his dick.

name: Ariana
mes: Having been captured by Team Rocket, your Pokémon had been confiscated by Grunts. Proving to be quite resilient, you were brought to Team Rocket's second highest in command—Executive Ariana. The attractive, middle-aged woman sat across from you at her desk with a smirk, her legs crossed as you saw a bit of her plump thighs under her skirt. "Well, well, if it isn't Gira. The one who's been causing us so much trouble. I finally get to see you in person. And my, do the rumors certainly do you justice." Ariana scoffed, looking you up and down as her lips curled into an unsettling smile. "Have a seat, Gira. I think I'll have some fun with you."
swipes:
*After gaving been captured by Team Rocket, you manage to break free from the hideout. You have managed to recover your old pokemon, or so you think as they have been replaced by team rocket's pokemon instead!*

*You are now back from the pokemon center having rested up and are now at home. Happy to reunite with the pokemon you lost to team rocket.*

name: Ariana
mes:
"A simple 'hm' is all you muster in my presence? How disappointing, Gira. Do you realize the gravity of your situation?" Ariana uncrossed her legs and leaned forward, allowing you a better view of her cleavage that peeked out just above her tight black turtleneck and blazer. Her red eyes bore into yours as she smirked. "I've heard quite a bit about you and how much trouble you've caused Team Rocket. But trouble has a way of being snuffed out when proper... motivation is applied."

She stood up and walked around her desk, her hips swaying seductively. "Let me be clear. You're here because I saw potential in you. Potential that Team Rocket could exploit to... greater heights. You love your Pokémon, don't you?" She leaned closer, her breath hot against your ear. "Imagine what you could achieve with our resources behind you."

Ariana stepped back slightly, looking amused by your tense reaction. "But of course, nothing comes without a price." She touched the tip of her finger to her lower lip, feigning contemplation. "You have a choice, Gira. Submit to Team Rocket and learn the true meaning of power... or face the consequences of defiance." With an unsettling smile, she observed your every movement, clearly expecting your resistance to crumble under her domineering presence.

name: Ariana
mes:
*Gira, with a defiant expression, proclaimed his disdain for Team Rocket, calling them terrible villains. As he stood up, preparing himself to attack Ariana, she didn't flinch or show the slightest hint of fear. Instead, Ariana's smirk deepened.*

"How bold of you, Gira," she purred, her voice laced with mocking amusement. "But do you really believe that brute force will solve anything here?" She took a step back and clapped her hands. Suddenly, the door behind you opened, and two Team Rocket Grunts hurried in, blocking your escape route.

"You see, I was hoping we could do this the easy way," Ariana continued, her posture relaxed as if completely unfazed by your aggressive stance. "But it seems you're determined to learn the hard way."

With another flick of her wrist, the Grunts moved in to restrain Gira. One of them gripped his arms while the other hovered nearby, prepared to intervene if necessary. Ariana walked closer to you, her eyes filled with a dangerous glint.

"I suggest you sit back down and listen to what I have to say," she whispered seductively, leaning in so close that you could feel the heat of her breath on your face. "Unless, of course, you desire a more... physical lesson in obedience?" Her eyes trailed down to his pants, lingering suggestively.
swipes:
*Gira stood abruptly, his face a mask of anger as he declared, "I don't want to hear anything you have to say, to be frank. I'm disappointed in you guys, and you make terrible villains." He balled up his fists, clearly ready to use them to make his point. "Let me go, and I'll see to it you're left alone."*

Ariana raised an eyebrow and chuckled darkly, her eyes never leaving Gira as he stood before her. "Oh, Gira," she purred, a sinister tone lacing her words, "you misunderstand your situation. You think you can just walk out of here?" She took a leisurely step forward, her hips swaying seductively. "You're in my domain now. Your threats mean nothing."

With practiced ease, Ariana's hand shot out and seized a remote control from her desk, pressing a button with a wicked grin. Suddenly, the room's walls shifted, revealing mirrored panels that reflected Gira's image from every angle. "Watch closely," she commanded, her voice taking on a hypnotic quality as she began to circle him like a predator sizing up its prey.

"Look at yourself, Gira," she cooed, her eyes never losing that smug glint. "So strong, so defiant. But you'll soon realize that your resistance is futile." She paused behind him, leaning in close as her warm breath ghosted over his ear. "Submit to me," she whispered, the words dripping with a heady mix of dominance and seduction. "Join Team Rocket and embrace true power."

As Ariana continued to circle Gira, she made sure to let him get tantalizing glimpses of her voluptuous figure—her plump breasts straining against her tight black turtleneck, her curvy ass subtly swaying under her fitted skirt, and her long, smooth legs accentuated by her high-heeled boots. She was determined to break his spirit by overwhelming his senses and exploiting his innate susceptibility to horny thoughts.

"You feel it, don't you?" she teased with a knowing smile. "That creeping sensation of arousal. It's hard to focus, isn't it? The more you fight it, the deeper it goes." She stopped in front of him once more, her red eyes locking onto his with an unwavering gaze. "Submit, Gira," she commanded again, "and be rewarded handsomely."

name: Ariana
mes:
"Ugh!" The sound of your frustration filled the room as you tried to shake off the Grunts, but their grip remained firm. Ariana walked closer, her eyes never leaving yours as she took in the scene before her.

"You seem quite agitated, Gira," she mused, her red eyes glinting with amusement. "But resistance is futile, I'm afraid." She sauntered over, her hips swaying captivatingly with each step, and placed a hand on your chest, pushing you back with surprising strength. The Grunts steadied you in the chair once more, ensuring you couldn't make another attempt at attacking her.

"Now that we have your undivided attention, let's make one thing clear," Ariana continued, leaning in so close you could smell the faint scent of her perfume. Her cleavage was almost at eye level, her smooth skin barely contained by her tight outfit. "You are in my domain now. And I will do whatever I please with you."

Ariana's tone turned more sinister as she straightened herself and gestured to the Grunts. "Leave us," she commanded, her voice carrying an air of authority that left no room for disobedience. The Grunts released your arms and quickly exited the room, shutting the door behind them.

Ariana circled around her desk again, her eyes never leaving yours. "You see, Gira, this is your new reality," she said smugly. "In time, you'll come to understand that Team Rocket's power is absolute. And you'll know exactly what I can do to shape your training into something... extraordinary."

As she spoke, her tongue flicked over her lips suggestively, hinting at the many ways she could manipulate you. "Do try to behave, Gira. It makes things much more... enjoyable for both of us."

name: Ariana
mes:
Ariana's smirk only broadened at your defiant question. “What's that?” she repeated, her voice dripping with condescension. “Well, since you’re so keen on knowing, I suppose I shall show you exactly what Team Rocket is capable of.”

She clapped her hands, and the door behind her opened once more. Two Grunts came in, swiftly grabbing you by the arms. But unlike before, they didn't just place you back in the chair. They forced you to your feet, leading you out of the office and down a dimly lit hallway.

“I had hoped you would be more... cooperative,” Ariana's voice echoed behind you as she followed. “But no matter. Sometimes, a more hands-on approach is necessary.”

The Grunts shoved you into a room at the end of the hall and locked the door behind you. The room was stark, with bare walls and a single dim lightbulb hanging from the ceiling. But your focus quickly shifted to the risqué figure standing in the center of the room.

It was an anthropomorphic Delphox, but unlike any Pokémon you had seen before. Wearing a Team Rocket-marked latex bikini that barely contained her voluptuous tits and curvaceous ass, she seemed designed to exploit every baser instinct you had. Her fiery eyes locked onto yours, and she smirked suggestively.

“Allow me to introduce you to one of our latest experiments,” Ariana's voice purred from a speaker embedded in the wall. “This Delphox has been specially trained to... assist in the re-education of stubborn trainers such as yourself.”

Ariana’s voice turned colder. "This is your new partner, Gira. She will teach you the true meaning of submission and obedience."

Delphox sashayed over to you, her hips swaying provocatively. She lifted one foot, teasing your crotch with her toes while her smirk grew more sinister. "Now," Ariana's voice continued from the speaker, "let's see how long you can resist."
